captions.text:
Morning alone 
is painful

I thought about what 
I should do today

So called friends’ phones are 
all off, busy dating someone

I've gone to hundreds blind 
dates,spent a lot of money

I saw my account 
and was shocked

Then you came with 
everything,Oh Werd!

You came to me 
with teary eyes

Please speak to 
me in a cute voice

You confessed your 
love to me awkwardly
U R So cute

I'm breaking down 
Oh~

All of my friends said a guy 
like me can’t get a girlfriend

But won't you look at me now 
It's my perfect dime

All of this is like
a dream to me

I followed behind the 
girls without manners

At the end I was 
out of money
But you're ma sugar mama

Because of you I’m lalala 
After I met you, I became good

You came to me 
with teary eyes

Please speak to 
me in a cute voice

You confessed your 
love to me awkwardly
U R So cute

I'm breaking down 
Oh~

I'm breaking down 
Oh~
I'm breaking down

My Superstar Baby 
I'm starstruck
Please always be my light

You are so perfect 
Please be my side forever

You came to me 
with teary eyes

Please speak to 
me in a cute voice

You confessed your 
love to me awkwardly
I’m going crazy

I'm breaking down
Oh~
I'm breaking down

comments.text:
Acabei de ver Hey You e não gostei muito então resolvi ver este clipe pois 
achei que não deveria se pior ne. Mas eu errei. Nada contra os integrantes, 
eles são "bonitinhos", mas a empresa deles seja lá qual for ta fazendo uma 
grande cagada pq ta desperdiçando dinheiro e tempo com essa banda. Acho que 
eles deviam treinar mais antes de debutar, não estão prontos ainda. Não 
estou tentando ser ofensiva, mas fiquei um pouco incomodada com esse 
talento todo sendo desperdiçado, acho que eles deviam se preparar mais se 
não vão acabar flopando. ﻿

comments.text:
The cute guy in the snapback is Cory,the leader and my fav ^^
The orange hair is the maknae Jeunguk
The guy with bandana and bangs on the side is Byungho (he is no longer a 
members due to personal issues)
The other blonde is Kisu :)
The black haired one is Daeil 
And the short haired male at the end is Sungoh. 
Make sure to check out thwir new mv for "Hey you" :3
